table.name: civicrm_phonecall
table.comment: Record details regarding phone call to a contact

field.name: source_contact_id
field.comment: Contact ID of person making the call. This will generally an authenticated user.

field.name: target_entity_table
field.comment: Name of table where item being referenced is stored.

field.name: target_entity_id
field.comment: Foreign key to the referenced item.

field.name: subject
field.comment: Short description of the subject of this call.

field.name: scheduled_date_time
field.comment: Date and time phonecall is scheduled to be made.

field.name: duration_hours
field.comment: Planned or actual duration of call - hours.

field.name: duration_minutes
field.comment: Planned or actual duration of call - minutes.

field.name: phone_id
field.comment: Phone ID of the number called (optional - used if an existing phone number is selected).

field.name: phone_number
field.comment: Phone number in case the number does not exist in the civicrm_phone table.

field.name: status
field.comment: What is the status of this phone call? Completed calls result in activity history entry.

field.name: parent_id
field.comment: Parent phone call ID (if this is a follow-up item). This is not currently implemented
